org.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users INNER JOIN watchers ON users.id = watchers.user_id WHERE watchers.watchable_id = "$1" AND watchers.watchable_type = "$2"

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users INNER JOIN watchers ON users.id = watchers.user_id WHERE watchers.watchable_id = "$1" AND watchers.watchable_type = "$2" LIMIT 1
